title: Do Google Reminders set on Google Home sync to Google Tasks on Google Pixel?
content:
Hi all,

iPhone user here contemplating switching to Google Pixel. Iâ€™m wondering if I set a reminder on my Google Home will it automatically sync to Google Tasks on Google Pixel or will I have to manually import it still like I do now with my iPhone?

Thanks!
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a (5G)
